    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">És el mateix l'hemodiàlisi que el ronyó artificial?</string>
            <string language="en">Is 'haemodialysis' the same as 'artificial kidney'?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ist ' dasselbe der Hämodialysen wie ' 
künstliche Niere '?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Est-ce que 'le même des hémodialyses est que 
'le rein artificiel '?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">É ' o mesmo dos haemodialysis' que ' o kidney 
artificial '?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">È 'lo stesso delle emodialisi 'del rene 
artificiale '?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι "αιμοδιάλυση" όπως το "τεχνητό νεφρό";</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre la diferència entre el procés (l'hemodiàlisi) i la màquina (ronyó artificial). Conté un enllaç extern per ampliar la informació.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on the difference between the process (haemodialysis) and the machine (artificial kidney). It includes an external link for further information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">malaltia</string>
            <string language="en">disease</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">biologia humana</string>
            <string language="en">human biology</string>
            <string language="es">biología humana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">medicina</string>
            <string language="en">medicine</string>
            <string language="es">medicina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">teràpia</string>
            <string language="en">therapy</string>
            <string language="es">terapia</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf dem 
Unterschied zwischen dem Prozeß (Hämodialyse) und der Maschine 
(künstliche Niere). Sie schließt ein externes Link für 
weitere Informationen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur la différence entre le
processus (hémodialyse) et la machine (rein artificiel). Il 
inclut un lien externe pour de plus amples informations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) na diferença entre o processo 
(haemodialysis) e a máquina (kidney artificial). Inclui uma 
ligação externa para uma informação mais adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sulla differenza fra il 
processo (emodialisi) e la macchina (rene artificiale). Include 
un collegamento esterno per ulteriori informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στη διαφορά μεταξύ της 
διαδικασίας (αιμοδιάλυση) και της μηχανής (τεχνητό νεφρό). 
Περιλαμβάνει μια εξωτερική σύνδεση για περισσότερες 
πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krankheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">menschliche Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Medizin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Therapie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">ιατρική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θεραπεία</string>
          </keyword>
